mapper.sql: SERNO, PS_PERD_NO, BILL_NO, DE_IR, UNSET_PS_PRCP_AMT, UNSET_PS_NORM_INT_AMT, UNSET_PS_OD_INT_AMT, UNSET_PS_COMM_OD_INT, OVER_DAYS, EST_OD_COMM_AMT, THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT, THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT_SUM, PERD_STATUS, OVER_DATE, INIT_STATUS, NET_PHONE, APP_DATE, SHOULD_ALSO_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into PSP_CLAIM_LIST (SERNO, PS_PERD_NO, BILL_NO, DE_IR, UNSET_PS_PRCP_AMT, UNSET_PS_NORM_INT_AMT, UNSET_PS_OD_INT_AMT, UNSET_PS_COMM_OD_INT, OVER_DAYS, EST_OD_COMM_AMT, THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT, THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT_SUM, PERD_STATUS, OVER_DATE, INIT_STATUS, NET_PHONE, APP_DATE, SHOULD_ALSO_DATE ) values (#{serno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psPerdNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deIr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unsetPsPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unsetPsNormIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unsetPsOdIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unsetPsCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{overDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{estOdCommAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{thisClaimAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{thisClaimAmountSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{perdStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shouldAlsoDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into PSP_CLAIM_LIST
SERNO,
PS_PERD_NO,
BILL_NO,
DE_IR,
UNSET_PS_PRCP_AMT,
UNSET_PS_NORM_INT_AMT,

THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT,
THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT_SUM,
PERD_STATUS,
OVER_DATE,
INIT_STATUS,
NET_PHONE,
APP_DATE,
SHOULD_ALSO_DATE,

mapper.update:
update PSP_CLAIM_LIST
BILL_NO = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DE_IR = #{deIr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNSET_PS_PRCP_AMT = #{unsetPsPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNSET_PS_NORM_INT_AMT = #{unsetPsNormIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNSET_PS_OD_INT_AMT = #{unsetPsOdIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNSET_PS_COMM_OD_INT = #{unsetPsCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVER_DAYS = #{overDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EST_OD_COMM_AMT = #{estOdCommAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT = #{thisClaimAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT_SUM = #{thisClaimAmountSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERD_STATUS = #{perdStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVER_DATE = #{overDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INIT_STATUS = #{initStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NET_PHONE = #{netPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_DATE = #{appDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOULD_ALSO_DATE = #{shouldAlsoDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SERNO = #{serno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PS_PERD_NO = #{psPerdNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update PSP_CLAIM_LIST set BILL_NO = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DE_IR = #{deIr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNSET_PS_PRCP_AMT = #{unsetPsPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNSET_PS_NORM_INT_AMT = #{unsetPsNormIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNSET_PS_OD_INT_AMT = #{unsetPsOdIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNSET_PS_COMM_OD_INT = #{unsetPsCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVER_DAYS = #{overDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EST_OD_COMM_AMT = #{estOdCommAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT = #{thisClaimAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, THIS_CLAIM_AMOUNT_SUM = #{thisClaimAmountSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERD_STATUS = #{perdStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OVER_DATE = #{overDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INIT_STATUS = #{initStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NET_PHONE = #{netPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_DATE = #{appDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOULD_ALSO_DATE = #{shouldAlsoDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SERNO = #{serno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PS_PERD_NO = #{psPerdNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select nvl(sum(a.UNSET_PS_PRCP_AMT),0) as prinAmt,nvl(sum(a.UNSET_PS_NORM_INT_AMT),0) as intAmt,nvl(sum(a.UNSET_PS_OD_INT_AMT),0) as lcAmt from psp_claim_list a where a.bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select nvl(sum(a.UNSET_PS_PRCP_AMT),0) as prinAmt,nvl(sum(a.UNSET_PS_NORM_INT_AMT),0) as intAmt,nvl(sum(a.UNSET_PS_OD_INT_AMT),0) as lcAmt from psp_claim_list a,psp_claim_loan b where a.bill_no = b.bill_no and b.claim_status = '02' and a.serno = b.serno and a.bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
